General.Name: Hi Sharp Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Hi Sharp Electronics Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells CCTV solutions in Taiwan. It offers 2MP, 4MP, 5MP, and 8MP hybrid cameras; analog cameras; customizable and panoramic cameras; starlight and dual light cameras; hybrid DVR products; and audio over coax series cameras. The company also provides face recognition, automatic number and license plate recognition, 180° panoramic/360° fisheye cameras, as well as chipsets and thermal solutions. In addition, it offers monitor/accessories, such as PoE switches, video baluns connectors, adaptors, surveillance MICs, video decoders, control keyboards, and LCD/test monitors. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 673, Changxing Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33452
